July 22, 1968
In addition, under the EEN Ford Foundation
programming grant, we expect to produce, in
1968-69, a regualr regional public affairs series
(alternate Tuesdays, 9:00-10:00 p.m., beginning
October 15) and a number of cultural and event
coverage specials which may also fit in this
category.
Good luck to you.
